Articles.Content:
While I am working on translating a guidance algorithm for my other project, I really miss modeling parts. Would you guys be interested in realistic parts that would allow you to emulate this fine aircraft?

Part List:

- Wing shapes

- Engines

- Intakes

- Fuselage Shapes

- Cockpit (crew of 2)

- Landing Gear

If not this, are there any aircraft that have parts you'd like to have?

What comes to mind are the SR71, B52, C17 etc.

Although the Valkyrie is an awesome aircraft, the B-1 is just so dang sexy. Such a beautiful piece of machinery. Big pics ahead...

Can I be greedy and have both LOL

P.S.: Lazurkri, cant agree more.
will it have the ejection capsules and will we be able to eva?

How about B1 Lancer parts?
Although the Valkyrie is an awesome aircraft, the B-1 is just so dang sexy. Such a beautiful piece of machinery. Big pics ahead...

It is such a blended shape that it may be tough to make separate parts. Maybe a bunch of standard realistic things like wings/engines is in order that way we can make more things that are similar to the craft we like?
I'd love this too. My Grandfather actually worked on the B-1's Climate control systems, so I'd love to see those parts..
B-1 is good, but i love the valkrie. the b-1 isnt dead. the valkyrie is. too bad the pilot got too close to the valkyrie! otherwise we would have seen her in action by now.... *sigh*

B-1 is good, but i love the valkrie. the b-1 isnt dead. the valkyrie is. too bad the pilot got too close to the valkyrie! otherwise we would have seen her in action by now.... *sigh*

You can still see one in Dayton Ohio at the air museum. She's a beauty.
